title.rendered: Samuel, Project Director at VINCI Construction Grands Projets

content.rendered:
Entrepreneurship

Samuel Sauzon works on the Kota Kinabalu project in Borneo, Malaysia. Starting out as senior contract manager, he was subsequently promoted to works director and then project director. He achieved this through determination and personal commitment, and his family joined him on the adventure.

excerpt.rendered: Samuel Sauzon works on the Kota Kinabalu project in Borneo, Malaysia
